page.title: 15HOUSING IN EAST LEAKE
page.content: Because the village has grown considerably in recent years,much of the housing is modern. Some building took place just after the second world war,but the majority of the extra houses were completed in the 1970's.It was then that three estates were completed.The 'Tree Estate(so called because each road,close,or avenue is named after a tree)is the largest.The houses vary in size but none are very large and for many of the inhabitants it is their first house. Bateman Road and the closes which lead off it is the second largest.Each close is named after a Cathedral City.The houses contain many young families. Manor Farm Meadow is smaller,the houses are larger.There are other smaller developments in the village.
